businessProfile.name: Steel City Pizza
businessProfile.address: 8600 Dorchester Rd, North Charleston, SC 29420, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 8600 Dorchester Rd, North Charleston, SC 29420, USA

reviews.text: We ordered the pizza night special. You get 2 salads, and order of their dip (either buffalo chicken or spinach), a large 16-inch pizza, and an order of Zeppolis.  Everything tasted great, but this is definitely more food than 2 people can eat. Needless to say, we had quite a bit of leftovers since we didn't know that it would be large portions that they gave. They do have other food besides pizza, like spaghetti, meatballs, etc. I would definitely visit this pizza place again.

We got the one slice special and it was very good.  Service was good and so was the atmosphere.  Took a picture of the salad but forgot to take one of the pizza slice before we are it lol. Next trip I got pictures including the pizza

The dark fireplace hearth against the dark floor is a hazard and needs protection on the corners and better visibility. Other than that the atmosphere is cute. I am highly disappointed. Our order was promised in 20min and took 30. The hostess is unfriendly. We asked to order to go. She thought we had a pickup order and just pointed us to the bar. We had to ask where  the menus are. The appetizer was sad. The Parmesan bites were dough puffs of air lightly sprinkled with Parmesan. They were so dissatisfying. The ‚Äúgrilled chicken‚Äù is pulled chicken; it looks like it‚Äôs from a can and doesn‚Äôt taste much better. After taking a bite, the entire toppings slid off of the pizza. The crust is bland and flavorless. It wasn‚Äôt worth it. I lost my appetite. I wouldn‚Äôt order here again and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to others.
My husband and I stopped here as we headed back from our trip. Great lunch specials and very good food. Service was great too!

I am in Charleston for work and wanted some pizza. I came across this gem. This is some of the best pizza I've had, great service. I've eaten here twice and only been in town for a week. I only complaint is there isn't a location where I live in Florida, PLEASE EXPAND to North Florida.

editorial_summary.overview: Casual eatery showing sports on HD TVs along with a menu of pizza, burgers, wings & sandwiches.

recentReviews.author: Lauren Ezell
recentReviews.text: My husband and I stopped here as we headed back from our trip. Great lunch specials and very good food. Service was great too!

recentReviews.author: Becky Mullins
recentReviews.text: We ordered the pizza night special. You get 2 salads, and order of their dip (either buffalo chicken or spinach), a large 16-inch pizza, and an order of Zeppolis.  Everything tasted great, but this is definitely more food than 2 people can eat. Needless to say, we had quite a bit of leftovers since we didn't know that it would be large portions that they gave. They do have other food besides pizza, like spaghetti, meatballs, etc. I would definitely visit this pizza place again.

recentReviews.author: Steven Poff
recentReviews.text: I am in Charleston for work and wanted some pizza. I came across this gem. This is some of the best pizza I've had, great service. I've eaten here twice and only been in town for a week. I only complaint is there isn't a location where I live in Florida, PLEASE EXPAND to North Florida.

recentReviews.author: Ames
recentReviews.text: The dark fireplace hearth against the dark floor is a hazard and needs protection on the corners and better visibility. Other than that the atmosphere is cute. I am highly disappointed. Our order was promised in 20min and took 30. The hostess is unfriendly. We asked to order to go. She thought we had a pickup order and just pointed us to the bar. We had to ask where  the menus are. The appetizer was sad. The Parmesan bites were dough puffs of air lightly sprinkled with Parmesan. They were so dissatisfying. The ‚Äúgrilled chicken‚Äù is pulled chicken; it looks like it‚Äôs from a can and doesn‚Äôt taste much better. After taking a bite, the entire toppings slid off of the pizza. The crust is bland and flavorless. It wasn‚Äôt worth it. I lost my appetite. I wouldn‚Äôt order here again and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to others.

recentReviews.author: K McKenna
recentReviews.text: We got the one slice special and it was very good.  Service was good and so was the atmosphere.  Took a picture of the salad but forgot to take one of the pizza slice before we are it lol. Next trip I got pictures including the pizza

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.0/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the generous portion sizes offered in the pizza night special, which often result in leftovers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is noted for its great lunch specials and very good food, making it a popular choice for quick meals. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The pizza is described as some of the best customers have had, with a strong desire for expansion to other locations. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and order mix-up issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and dissatisfaction with food quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and safety concerns - social media marketing can improve this area
